abstract: Kathryn Tesija will step down as chief merchandising and supply chain officer for Target, latest evidence of restructuring by new chief executive Brian Cornell.
lead_paragraph: A Target spokeswoman said that Target would be considering both internal and external candidates for a successor.

headline.main: Top Target Officer to Exit Post as Part of Retailer’s Reshaping
headline.print_headline: Top Target Officer to Exit Post as Part of Retailer’s Reshaping

snippet: A Target spokeswoman said that Target would be considering both internal and external candidates for a successor.
